languages.text: "Сам бы лучше не сказал, Лорд-капитан. Побыстрее бы на свежий воздух — и от запаха нечистот, и от... местной публики подальше".
"I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."
languages.original_text: "Сам бы лучше не сказал, Лорд-капитан. Побыстрее бы на свежий воздух — и от запаха нечистот, и от... местной публики подальше".

traits.locale_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the local crowd too."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the local crowd too."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous m'ôtez les mots de la bouche, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous aurions tous besoin d'un peu d'air frais, loin de la puanteur... et de la population locale. »
languages.original_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'ôtez les mots de la bouche, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous aurions tous besoin d'un peu d'air frais, loin de la puanteur... et de la population locale. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、これ以上的確な表現はありません。悪臭から逃れて、新鮮な空気を吸うことができました…地元の者たちも同じ気持ちでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、これ以上的確な表現はありません。悪臭から逃れて、新鮮な空気を吸うことができました…地元の者たちも同じ気持ちでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我完全赞同您的看法，舰长大人。我们都得好好呼吸些新鲜空气，远离恶臭的味道……和这些当地人。”
languages.original_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."

traits.locale_text: “我完全赞同您的看法，舰长大人。我们都得好好呼吸些新鲜空气，远离恶臭的味道……和这些当地人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hätte es nicht besser sagen können, Lord Captain. Wir könnten alle etwas frische Luft brauchen, fern von diesem Gestank ... und den Einheimischen."
languages.original_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte es nicht besser sagen können, Lord Captain. Wir könnten alle etwas frische Luft brauchen, fern von diesem Gestank ... und den Einheimischen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Comparto su parecer, Lord Capitán. A todos nos vendría bien un poco de aire fresco, lejos de esta peste... y de los lugareños».
languages.original_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."

traits.locale_text: «Comparto su parecer, Lord Capitán. A todos nos vendría bien un poco de aire fresco, lejos de esta peste... y de los lugareños».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hay ağzına sağlık Lord Kaptan. Temiz havaya hasret kaldık. Şuranın kokusundan... Bir de insanlarından uzaklaşsak..."
languages.original_text: "I couldn't have put it better myself, Lord Captain. We could all do with some fresh air, away from the stench... and the locals too."

traits.locale_text: "Hay ağzına sağlık Lord Kaptan. Temiz havaya hasret kaldık. Şuranın kokusundan... Bir de insanlarından uzaklaşsak..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
